entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers and then to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
